DOC.brief_summary: Honey available New Zealand contain toxin tutin hyenanchin . Tutin produce several plant native New Zealand . Bees collect honeydew contaminate tutin hyenanchin honey production . Honey contaminate high level tutin cause case poison New Zealand since 1800s , recent outbreak 2008 . The study aim find tutin hyenanchin absorbed process body . This information help Food Standards Australia New Zealand ( FSANZ ) give guidance acceptable level tutin hyenanchin honey . About 6 healthy men take single dose honey contain know concentration tutin hyenanchin . This dose level similar someone eats lot honey would consume , honey contain maximum level tutin allow Food Standards Code . Blood test measure tutin hyenanchin level take certain time dose , side effect record .
DOC.brief_title: A Study How Tutin Hyenanchin , Two Toxins Found Honey , Are Absorbed Processed Body
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Healthy male , age 18 55 year , body mass index 18 32 kg/m2 Healthy basis medical history screening assessment Agree abstain alcohol consumption require per protocol Able participate , willing give write informed consent willing comply study rule Exclusion Criteria History clinically relevant medical disorder Any gastrointestinal disorder previous surgery may affect absorption study product . History significant gastroesophageal reflux disease peptic ulcer disease . Significant neurological history Known allergy hypersensitivity honey Sustained blood pressure heart rate recording outside range specify per protocol Clinically significant laboratory abnormality , positive serology , drug abuse alcohol screen . Smokers > 10 cigarettes/day within 3 month , unable stop smoking study Participation investigational drug study within 1 month prior dose Blood plasma donation > 500 mL within 3 month prior dose Prescription herbal remedy take within exclusion period specify per protocol Consumption food beverage contain honey , within 72 hour prior dose Known suspect previous tutin poisoning
